oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This Master Dissertation explores the role of films in the L2 classroom as a resource for increasing students' motivation for learning and using the English language. It also analyses the use of films as a resource for enhancing students' listening and speaking skills. For this purpose, a work plan with a film is proposed. This work plan has been implemented in first year of Compulsory Secondary Education, and it is used as the basis for the conclusions presented in the Dissertation.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Films in the L2 Classroom: A Resource for Motivating Students and Enhancing their Listening and Speaking Skills
